pipeline.lumi_lights.name: Lumi Lights
pipeline.lumi_lights.desc: Cool sunrise and shiny stuff methinks
pipeline.lumi_lights_dev.name: Lumi Lights Dev
pipeline.kaleidoskop.name: KALEIDOSKOP
config.lumi_lights.help.bloom_intensity: Intensity of glow effect around light sources.
config.lumi_lights.help.bloom_downsample: Affects size of bloom effect around light sources.
config.lumi_lights.help.bloom_upsample_s: Affects Size of bloom effect around light sources.
config.lumi_lights.help.bloom_cutoff: Clamps low-intensity bloom edges to reduce halos and banding.
config.lumi_lights.help.handheld_light_r: Max reach of held light source. Set to 0 to disable
config.lumi_lights.help.true_darkness_de: True darkness in the overworld and custom dimensions with sky light
config.lumi_lights.help.true_darkness_ne: True darkness in the Nether and custom dimensions with darkened sky
config.lumi_lights.help.true_darkness_en: True darkness in the End and custom dimensions without sky light
config.lumi_lights.help.fog_near_chunks: Distance where fog starts in chunks
config.lumi_lights.help.fog_far_chunks: Distance where fog gets the thickest in chunks
config.lumi_lights.help.fog_below_water_: Where fog is at the thickest below water level (in chunks)
config.lumi_lights.help.fog_above_water_: Where fog is at the thinnest above water level (in chunks)
config.lumi_lights.help.underwater_fog_n: Distance where fog starts in chunks (underwater)
config.lumi_lights.help.underwater_fog_f: Distance where fog gets the thickest in chunks (underwater)
config.lumi_lights.help.constant_reflect: Constant-length ray steps for nearby reflections. High performance impact
config.lumi_lights.help.multiplicative_r: Coarse ray steps for faraway reflections. High performance impact
config.lumi_lights.help.reflection_ray_i: Initial ray length in blocks. Also used for fine ray steps
config.lumi_lights.help.reflection_ray_m: Limit the length of coarse ray steps
Multiplier for coarse ray steps. Higher means coarser but longer reflections
respackopts.tooltip.LUMI.PBR: Emulate fresnel effect and metals (performance impact)
respackopts.tooltip.LUMI.DayAmbientBlue: How blue the day ambient is in the overworld
respackopts.tooltip.LUMI.DramaticLightin: Environment bloom during sunrise and sunset
